Text:
Thank you formulaup & seeders.

This race is an instant classic, a must see. The spam email appearing in the bottom of the screen every 10 minutes or so is annoying but the quality is great.

Podium champagne spraying & post-podium interviews missing. :-(

Nice job, thx,

Who is this knighty character? One should not be so bold to *advertise* to the world (and the BBC) who it is that has ..technically...illegally copied and distributed copyrighted material. it's like hanging a bull's eye sign on you.....lol, better to remain anonymous.
